markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Expert Captivator Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3363) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 121</row>

**Archetype** [Captivator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=125)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Captivator Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3359)

</column>

---

You learn more powerful spells to enchant and deceive. You learn a 4th-level occult spell. At 12th level, you learn a 5th-level spell, and at 14th level, you learn a 6th-level spell. Each of these spells must come from either the [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61) or [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92) school. You Cast these Spells as occult innate spells. You become an expert with spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.

<title level="2">Expert Captivator Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Master Captivator Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3366)
name: Expert Captivator Spellcasting
